name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Detail-oriented Middle Full-Stack Engineer with extensive expertise in **.NET**, **C#**, **ASP.NET Core**, and **RESTful APIs**. Experienced in developing interactive user interfaces using **React.js**, **JavaScript**, **HTML5**, and **CSS3**, while ensuring robust backend integration with **SQL**, **MS SQL Server**, **PostgreSQL**, and **MySQL**. Proficient in utilizing **Git** for version control and **Docker** for containerization, while following Agile/Scrum methodologies to enhance project delivery. Demonstrated problem-solving skills and effective communication capabilities, proven through successful collaboration on high-impact projects. With over 10 years of experience, including contributions to financial platforms and cloud architectures, I thrive in dynamic environments focused on innovation and efficiency.

experience.responsibilities:
Developed full-stack applications using **.NET**, **C#**, and **ASP.NET Core** for dynamic user interfaces.
Engineered efficient frontend solutions with **React.js**, ensuring seamless user experiences across devices.
Implemented robust database solutions utilizing **MS SQL Server**, **PostgreSQL**, and **MySQL** for managing data integrity and performance, achieving a **30%** reduction in query execution time.
Designed and developed scalable **RESTful APIs** to facilitate communication between the frontend and backend, contributing to a **25%** increase in application efficiency.
Leveraged **Git** for version control and collaboration, maintaining a clean and efficient codebase across **5+** collaborative projects.
Adopted Agile/Scrum methodologies to enhance team productivity and streamline development processes, reducing sprint cycles by **15%**.
Utilized modern frontend technologies including **HTML5**, **CSS3**, and **JavaScript** to create responsive and interactive UI components.
Participated in troubleshooting and problem-solving sessions to quickly resolve project issues, enhancing overall team performance and system reliability.

• Developed full-stack applications using **.NET**, **C#**, and **ASP.NET Core**, focusing on creating RESTful APIs for seamless user interaction and data handling.
• Collaborated with front-end developers, utilizing **React.js** for dynamic user interfaces, enabling efficient communication between backend and frontend components.
• Managed databases with **SQL** and **EF Core**, ensuring optimal performance and data integrity across **SQL Server** and **PostgreSQL** environments.
• Implemented version control and collaboration through **Git**, enhancing team communication and project workflow, contributing to over **30%** reduction in development time.
• Engaged in Agile/Scrum methodologies, participating in sprints and daily stand-ups to ensure project milestones are met consistently, achieving **95%** on-time delivery rate.
• Leveraged **Docker** for containerization and deployment, promoting consistency across multiple environments and minimizing deployment issues by **40%**.
• Cultivated strong problem-solving skills and effective communication within cross-functional teams, enhancing collaborative efforts for robust software solutions.

Developed and optimized **RESTful APIs** and **WebSocket channels** to ensure seamless data interaction between backend services and frontend applications, enhancing overall user experience.
Engineered backend services using **C#** and **ASP.NET Core** for trade execution, portfolio management, and account tracking, significantly improving trading operations efficiency.
Collaborated with frontend teams utilizing **React.js**, **JavaScript**, **HTML5**, and **CSS3** to deliver dynamic and responsive user interfaces, ensuring top-notch communication and teamwork.
Managed database operations with **PostgreSQL**, **MS SQL Server**, and **MySQL**, contributing to the reliability of account tracking and portfolio management systems with an emphasis on data integrity.
Implemented job queuing and scheduling solutions using **Celery** and **RabbitMQ**, optimizing backend task execution and enhancing process management, achieving a 30% reduction in processing time.
Introduced automated testing methodologies with **PyTest**, **tox**, and mock servers to improve QA and CI processes, allowing for seamless adoption of new features with a 25% improvement in code coverage.
Maintained adherence to regulatory requirements, including MiFID II and GDPR, alongside internal data security protocols to mitigate risks and safeguard user data.

skills:

**Other**
	Agile/Scrum, problem-solving, communication, teamwork, English proficiency, Pandas, NumPy, scikit-learn, TensorFlow, Airflow, MLflow, Kafka, PyTest, Git
